rev.comment: /* November 9: Demonstration begins; Police response */ +notable Berkely prof link
rev.diff:
Line 12: Line 12:
Protesters formed a human chain in front of the tents to prevent officers from dismantling the encampment. Police used [[Baton_(law_enforcement)|36-inch riot batons]] to push back the protesters and to break the human chain. After the police broke through the protesters, they confiscated and threw away the tents. <ref name=10KGO />
Protesters formed a human chain in front of the tents to prevent officers from dismantling the encampment. Police used [[Baton_(law_enforcement)|36-inch riot batons]] to push back the protesters and to break the human chain. After the police broke through the protesters, they confiscated and threw away the tents. <ref name=10KGO />
â
Video footage of the afternoon confrontation show police beating protesters with batons and dragging two protesters by the hair, one of whom was UC Berkeley English professor Celeste Langan. <ref>{{cite news|last=Gollan|first=Jennifer|title=UC Berkeley Pledges to Investigate Police Response to Occupy Cal Protest|url=http://www.baycitizen.org/occupy-movement/story/uc-berkeley-pledges-investigate-police/|accessdate=13 November 2011|newspaper=The Bay Citizen|date=11 November 2011}}</ref> 39 protesters including Professor Langan were arrested for charges including "resisting and delaying a police officer in the performance of their duties, and failure to disperse when given a dispersal order."<ref>{{cite news|last=Bowe|first=Rebecca|title=Occupy Cal makes its dramatic entrance|url=http://www.sfbg.com/politics/2011/11/10/occupy-cal-makes-its-dramatic-entrance|accessdate=13 November 2011|newspaper=San Francisco Bay Guardian|date=10 November 2011}}</ref>
+
Video footage of the afternoon confrontation show police beating protesters with batons and dragging two protesters by the hair, one of whom was UC Berkeley English professor [[Celeste Langan]]. <ref>{{cite news|last=Gollan|first=Jennifer|title=UC Berkeley Pledges to Investigate Police Response to Occupy Cal Protest|url=http://www.baycitizen.org/occupy-movement/story/uc-berkeley-pledges-investigate-police/|accessdate=13 November 2011|newspaper=The Bay Citizen|date=11 November 2011}}</ref> 39 protesters including Professor Langan were arrested for charges including "resisting and delaying a police officer in the performance of their duties, and failure to disperse when given a dispersal order."<ref>{{cite news|last=Bowe|first=Rebecca|title=Occupy Cal makes its dramatic entrance|url=http://www.sfbg.com/politics/2011/11/10/occupy-cal-makes-its-dramatic-entrance|accessdate=13 November 2011|newspaper=San Francisco Bay Guardian|date=10 November 2011}}</ref>
==November 10: Reaction and criticism of Nov. 9 police action==
==November 10: Reaction and criticism of Nov. 9 police action==
